bio: Catherine Rossi is a master of classical painting techniques, drawing inspiration from the Italian Renaissance. Based in Florence, she creates works that blend traditional methods with contemporary themes, earning recognition in the international art community.

media.videoPost: Back in my Florence studio, practicing classical techniques passed down through generations. Mixing my own pigments and preparing canvas the traditional way. There's something magical about connecting with the masters of the Renaissance. #ClassicalArt #Renaissance #FlorenceArtist
